text:
<@U15F6NX2N>: couple things from my last meeting about the project!
- create a user guide for how to use the Mood Ring system for the average employee (how to talk to Slackbot, what happens when they give Slackbot a color, etc.)
- write up a document that documents the whole process for a blog post, work with <@U0B9N0HF0> to get this done! include things like our intentions, purpose, the "semiotics" of our work
